product_name: The North Face  Borealis Daypack - Women's
long_description: The North Face Borealis daypack offers techical performance and serves double duty as a school bag or work briefcase. Form-fitting shoulder straps, hipbelt and back panel offer great fit and comfort.
short_description: The North Face Borealis daypack offers techical performance and serves double duty as a school bag or work briefcase. Form-fitting shoulder straps, hipbelt and back panel offer great fit and comfort.
